CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 2006 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 2006 Code, as supplemented through April 20, 2021, which are included herein. Sections of the 2006 Code, as supplemented, not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances and other legislation adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
